title: Minecraft Java版 1.15.2 发布
author: Halcyon_Suoh
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Halcyon_Suoh 于 2020-1-22 14:25 编辑 

Minecraft Java版是指Windows、Mac OS与Linux平台上，使用Java语言开发的Minecraft版本。
正式版是Minecraft Java版经过一段时间的预览版测试后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Mod与服务器插件会逐渐跟进的版本。官方启动器也会第一时间进行推送。
建议玩家与服主关注其相关服务端、Mod与插件的更新，迎接新的正式版吧！专注于单人原版游戏的玩家可立即更新，多人游戏玩家请关注您所在服务器的通知。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。




Minecraft Java Edition 1.15.2
Minecraft Java Edition 1.15.2
A Minecraft Java Edition Release
Minecraft正式版


We are now releasing 1.15.2 which tweaks some behaviours and fixes a few bugs. We expect this to be the last release for 1.15.
满载漏洞修复的1.15.2现已发布，该版本理论上是1.15最后一个正式版。

Next up, Nether!
下一站！下界更新！

CHANGES IN 1.15.2
1.15.2版本改动

Bees no longer anger when a nearby nest/hive is destroyed using a silk touch tool蜜蜂不再会因附近的蜂巢/蜂箱被玩家以附有精准采集魔咒的工具采集而被激怒Added doPatrolSpawning and doTraderSpawning game rules that control spawning of patrols and wandering traders, respectively加入 doPatrolSpawning 及 doTraderSpawning 两条游戏规则，分别可用来控制 灾厄巡逻队 及 流浪商人 是否会自然生成Added gui_light option in block models to allow controlling light when rendering model as item in GUI

Controls light when rendering block model inside slot. If set to side, model will be rendered like block. If set to front, model is shaded like flat item
Controls light when rendering block model inside slot。If set to side，model will be rendered like block。If set to front，model is shaded like flat item
为方块模型加入 gui_light 选项，可以其控制用户界面中该模型的光照渲染
若gui_light设为 side 则该物品模型的光照将会以方块模型来渲染，若其设置为 front 则该物品模型将被作为物品来渲染
Any birch or oak sapling grown near a flower within 2 blocks distance on the same y-level has a 5% chance of having a bee nest在同y轴上周围两格内有花的树苗有5%几率在长成后带有蜂巢Bee Nests now have a 2% chance of spawning in Flower Forests蜂巢现有2%几率在繁花森林中生成Bee Nests now have a 0.2% chance of spawning in Forest, Wooded Hills, Birch Forest, Tall Birch Forest, Birch Forest Hills, and Tall Birch Hills biomes蜂巢现有0.2%几率在森林、繁茂的丘陵、桦木森林、高大桦木森林、桦木森林丘陵、高大桦木丘陵群系生成。Fixed bugs漏洞修复


FIXED BUGS IN 1.15.2
1.15.2漏洞修复

MC-169825 - “Multiplayer (3rd party)” shows in window title when disconnecting from a singleplayer worldMC-169825 - 退出单人世界时标题栏会显示「多人游戏（第三方）」MC-169839 - Certain potion effects that override lower level effects don’t get removed after their duration endsMC-169839 - 某些药水效果在更高级的药水效果时间耗尽后药水效果不会被移除MC-169840 - Drinking a level 1 potion under a level 2 beacon and leaving results in the effect being lostMC-169840 - 在信标给予的二级药水效果下喝下同种类但等级较低的药水后离开信标范围会导致其药水效果会在信标效果结束后跟着消失MC-169848 - Crashes when trying to create Beehive From planted treeMC-169848 - 试图在玩家种的树上生成蜂巢会导致游戏崩溃MC-169886 - No older world protection in 1.15.2 PR 1MC-169886 - 1.15 预发布版 1 中不再在打开旧世界时弹出确认提示了MC-862 - Spawn protection doesn’t work for item frames, paintings and armor standsMC-862 - 出生点保护(spawn-protection)对物品展示框，画，盔甲架无效MC-1541 - Beacon effect removes potion effect of the same typeMC-1541 - 信标施加的药水效果会覆盖玩家身上同种类的药水效果MC-51053 - Furnace minecarts lose power after navigating cornersMC-51053 - 动力矿车在拐弯时会失去能量MC-150575 - Concrete powder does not turn into concrete when letting it fall beside waterMC-150575 - 混凝土粉末坠落到水旁边时不会转换为混凝土MC-153987 - Falling down ladders while wearing elytraMC-153987 - 装备鞘翅且攀在梯子向下看时按下空格会导致你开始使用鞘翅滑翔MC-165695 - Hoppers harvesting honeycomb from bee hives and bee nests only pick up one honeycombMC-165695 - 使用发射器+剪刀的方式来采集蜜脾时，放置在蜂巢/蜂箱其下的漏斗只会捡起一片蜜脾MC-166312 - Loom UI pattern icons are too darkMC-166312 - 织布机界面中的图标过暗MC-166319 - B on “Open in browser” is lowercase in link confirmation GUIMC-166319 - 链接跳转确认界面中的 “Open in browser” 的 B 是小写的MC-166324 - “Raw input” button has lowercase “i”MC-166324 - “Raw input” 中的 “i” 是小写的MC-166722 - Some custom item models appear dark in the inventoryMC-166722 - 某些自定义模型在物品栏中显示过暗MC-167018 - Misplaced pixel in critical hit particle textureMC-167018 - critical_hit贴图中某个像素错误MC-167079 - Horse Armor texture is offMC-167079 - 马铠物品贴图错位MC-167201 - Invisible glowing entities do not respect their team colorMC-167201 - 隐身的发光实体的发光效果不遵循其队伍颜色MC-167219 - Reloading a resource pack enough times will cause intense lagMC-167219 - 重载多次资源包会造成巨大卡顿MC-167220 - Items on marker armor stands no longer glowMC-167220 - 放置于带有marker标签的盔甲架上的物品不会发光MC-167235 - Distance from where you can enter a bed is off centerMC-167235 - 用于判定可否使用床的区域的区域中心错位MC-167344 - com.mojang.blaze3d.platform.ClipboardManager leaks direct buffersMC-167344 - com.mojang.blaze3d.platform.ClipboardManager 缓冲区泄露MC-167416 - Distance from where a monster will stop you from sleeping is off centerMC-167416 - 用于判定区域内是否有怪物阻止你使用床的区域的区域中心错位MC-167444 - iron_golem_crackiness_* textures show up on invisible iron golems that are damagedMC-167444 - 铁傀儡的裂纹贴图可在铁傀儡隐身时可视MC-167709 - Bees that ride a boat, minecart or other entities when entering their hive or nest can’t leave the hive or nest ever againMC-167709 - 骑着船、矿车或其他实体的蜜蜂在进入蜂箱或蜂巢以后不再能出来了MC-168091 - Concrete powder doesn’t convert into concrete when dropped into deep waterMC-168091 - 混凝土粉末坠落入两格及以上深的水时不会转换为混凝土MC-168230 - End crystal beam is dark / desaturatedMC-168230 - 末影水晶光束过暗MC-168467 - Bees do not remember how many crops they’ve pollinatedMC-168467 - 蜜蜂丢失其CropsGrownSincePollination数据MC-169157 - Breaking a hive with obstructed front makes bees vanishMC-169157 - 使用不带有精准采集魔咒的工具采集一个正前方被方块堵住的蜂巢会导致其内蜜蜂消失




正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/其他https://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.tar.gz正式版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。Java版的启动器下载地址在上文已经提供。对于非正版用户非正版用户也请使用启动器下载游戏，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文）Grum的Twitter（英文）Searge的Twitter（英文）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
